title: Ornelas (Juvenal Honório de)
body: Doctor of medicine from the school of Paris. He was born on this island and died here, at the age of 67, on October 20, 1873. He was a professor at the defunct medical school of Funchal. Works: Dissertation on the treatment of postpartum hemorrhage, by compressing the abdominal aorta on the belly, the suitable position of the uterus, and the use of ergotized rye and tonics (thesis); Paris, 1834.
